/* System.xml -> getMyMenuList */ SELECT CASE WHEN #{LANG} = 'FR' THEN SY.SYSTEM_FR WHEN #{LANG} = 'EN' THEN SY.SYSTEM_EN ELSE SY.SYSTEM_EN END PROG_NM3 , CASE WHEN #{LANG} = 'FR' THEN PR2.PROG_FR WHEN #{LANG} = 'EN' THEN PR2.PROG_EN ELSE PR2.PROG_EN END AS PROG_NM2 , CASE WHEN #{LANG} = 'FR' THEN PR1.PROG_FR WHEN #{LANG} = 'EN' THEN PR1.PROG_EN ELSE PR1.PROG_EN END AS PROG_NM1 , NM.PROG_CD AS PROG_CD , NM.PRIORITY AS PRIORITY FROM SY_MYMENU NM INNER JOIN SY_PROGRAM PR1 ON NM.PROG_CD = PR1.PROG_CD INNER JOIN SY_PROGRAM PR2 ON PR1.COMP_CD = PR2.COMP_cD AND PR1.PROG_GROUP = PR2.PROG_CD INNER JOIN SY_SYSTEM SY ON PR2.COMP_CD = SY.COMP_CD AND PR2.SYSTEM_CD = SY.SYSTEM_CD WHERE NM.USER_ID = #{USER_ID} ORDER BY NM.PRIORITY, SY.PRIORITY, PR2.PRIORITY, PR1.PRIORITY
